content: अंकुशः [अंक्-लक्षणे उशच् <ls>Uṇ. 4. 107</ls>] A hook, a goad; Proverb: विक्रीते करिणि किमंकुशे विवादः why higgle about a trifling thing when the whole bargain (of which it forms part) has been struck (the goad ought to follow the elephant); संनिवेश्य कुशावत्यां रिपुनागांकुशं कुशं <ls>R. 15. 97</ls>; (<ab>fig.</ab>) one who checks, a corrector, governor, director; त्यजति तु यदा मोहान्मार्गं तदा गुरुरंकुशः <ls>Mu. 3. 6</ls>; कुशं द्विषामंकुशं <ls>R. 16. 81</ls>; a restraint or check; निरंकुशाः कवयः poets have free license or are unfettered. --शी one of the 24 Jaina Goddesses. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>Germ.</ab> {%angel%}.]
